function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion","Impact":"Health risks to people exposed to hazardous substances","Mitigation":"Ensure proper waste sorting and control of combustion temperature to prevent the generation of hazardous substances","Technologies":"Waste sorting technologies, combustion temperature control technologies","People":"Waste management workers, community members near incineration facilities","Owner":"Waste management authorities, incineration facility operators"},{"Description":"Mixing non-hazardous wastes with hazardous or infectious pollutants may require special disposal and disinfection","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and contamination","Mitigation":"Implement strict waste segregation protocols and provide clear guidelines for waste disposal","Technologies":"Waste segregation technologies, contamination detection technologies","People":"Waste management workers, healthcare facility staff","Owner":"Waste management authorities, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection and disposal leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive guidelines for disinfection and disposal of different types of hospital wastes, provide training to waste management personnel","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, waste management protocols","People":"Waste management workers, healthcare facility staff","Owner":"Waste management authorities, healthcare facility management"}]}
